result.eng: I'll talk to you at lunch time.
result.ga: labhróidh mé leat ag am lóin
result.orig: Labhróidh mé leat ag am lóin
result.html: labhróidh mé leat ag am lóinI'll talk to you at lunch time.
result.ponchtml: laḃróiḋ mé leat ag am lóinI'll talk to you at lunch time.

result.eng: May I speak to Patrick?
result.ga: an dtig liom labhairt le pádraig
result.orig: An dtig liom labhairt le Pádraig
result.html: an dtig liom labhairt le pádraigMay I speak to Patrick?
result.ponchtml: an dtig liom laḃairt le pádraigMay I speak to Patrick?

result.eng: Do not talk to the other person.
result.ga: ná labhair leis an duine eile
result.orig: Ná labhair leis an duine eile
result.html: ná labhair leis an duine eileDo not talk to the other person.
result.ponchtml: ná laḃair leis an duine eileDo not talk to the other person.

result.eng: Can I talk to you now? - Okay, go ahead.
result.ga: an féidir liom labhairt leat anois - ceart go leor abair leat
result.orig: An féidir liom labhairt leat anois - Ceart go leor abair leat
result.html: an féidir liom labhairt leat anois - ceart go leor abair leatCan I talk to you now? - Okay, go ahead.
result.ponchtml: an féidir liom laḃairt leat anois - ceart go leor abair leatCan I talk to you now? - Okay, go ahead.

result.eng: The language they spoke was Irish and not English.
result.ga: ba í gaeilge seachas béarla an teanga a labhair siad
result.orig: Ba í Gaeilge seachas Béarla an teanga a labhair siad
result.html: ba í gaeilge seachas béarla an teanga a labhair siadThe language they spoke was Irish and not English.
result.ponchtml: ba í gaeilge seaċas béarla an teanga a laḃair siadThe language they spoke was Irish and not English.

result.eng: You will have to talk to her again.
result.ga: beidh ort labhairt léi arís
result.orig: Beidh ort labhairt léi arís
result.html: beidh ort labhairt léi arísYou will have to talk to her again.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ ort laḃairt léi arísYou will have to talk to her again.

result.eng: Only Irish is spoken here.
result.ga: gaeilge amháin a labhraítear anseo
result.orig: Gaeilge amháin a labhraítear anseo
result.html: gaeilge amháin a labhraítear anseoOnly Irish is spoken here.
result.ponchtml: gaeilge aṁáin a laḃraítear anseoOnly Irish is spoken here.

result.eng: I like talking to people.
result.ga: is breá liom labhairt le daoine
result.orig: Is breá liom labhairt le daoine
result.html: is breá liom labhairt le daoineI like talking to people.
result.ponchtml: is breá liom laḃairt le daoineI like talking to people.

result.eng: I can talk to you tomorrow.
result.ga: is féidir liom labhairt leat amárach
result.orig: Is féidir liom labhairt leat amárach
result.html: is féidir liom labhairt leat amárachI can talk to you tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: is féidir liom laḃairt leat amáraċI can talk to you tomorrow.

result.eng: She talks fast.
result.ga: labhraíonn sí go tapa
result.orig: Labhraíonn sí go tapa
result.html: labhraíonn sí go tapaShe talks fast.
result.ponchtml: laḃraíonn sí go tapaShe talks fast.

result.eng: She speaks slowly and carefully.
result.ga: labhraíonn sí go mall cúramach
result.orig: Labhraíonn sí go mall cúramach
result.html: labhraíonn sí go mall cúramachShe speaks slowly and carefully.
result.ponchtml: laḃraíonn sí go mall cúramaċShe speaks slowly and carefully.

result.eng: She spoke briefly.
result.ga: labhair sí go gairid
result.orig: Labhair sí go gairid
result.html: labhair sí go gairidShe spoke briefly.
result.ponchtml: laḃair sí go gairidShe spoke briefly.

result.eng: Do not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.
result.ga: ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseacht
result.orig: Ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseacht
result.html: ná labhair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseachtDo not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.
result.ponchtml: ná laḃair leis an tiománaí agus an bus ag gluaiseaċtDo not talk to the driver while the bus is moving.

result.eng: I can't talk to you, I'm too busy.
result.ga: ní féidir liom labhairt leat tá mé róghnóthach
result.orig: Ní féidir liom labhairt leat tá mé róghnóthach
result.html: ní féidir liom labhairt leat tá mé róghnóthachI can't talk to you, I'm too busy.
result.ponchtml: ní féidir liom laḃairt leat tá mé róġnóṫaċI can't talk to you, I'm too busy.

result.eng: This is not the right time to talk to me.
result.ga: ní hé seo an t-am ceart le labhairt liom
result.orig: Ní hé seo an t-am ceart le labhairt liom
result.html: ní hé seo an t-am ceart le labhairt liomThis is not the right time to talk to me.
result.ponchtml: ní hé seo an t-am ceart le laḃairt liomThis is not the right time to talk to me.

result.eng: She doesn't speak as much as you.
result.ga: ní labhraíonn sí an oiread céanna leatsa
result.orig: Ní labhraíonn sí an oiread céanna leatsa
result.html: ní labhraíonn sí an oiread céanna leatsaShe doesn't speak as much as you.
result.ponchtml: ní laḃraíonn sí an oiread céanna leatsaShe doesn't speak as much as you.

result.eng: He wasn't willing to talk to me any more.
result.ga: ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadh
result.orig: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadh
result.html: ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadhHe wasn't willing to talk to me any more.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ sé sásta laḃairt liom a ṫuilleaḋHe wasn't willing to talk to me any more.

result.eng: I haven't spoken to her since we left school.
result.ga: níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoil
result.orig: Níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoil
result.html: níor labhair mé léi ó d'fhág muid an scoilI haven't spoken to her since we left school.
result.ponchtml: níor laḃair mé léi ó d'ḟág muid an scoilI haven't spoken to her since we left school.

result.eng: I need to talk to you about my contract.
result.ga: teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradh
result.orig: Teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradh
result.html: teastaíonn uaim labhairt leat maidir le mo chonradhI need to talk to you about my contract.
result.ponchtml: teastaíonn uaim laḃairt leat maidir le mo ċonraḋI need to talk to you about my contract.

result.eng: I am here to talk to you.
result.ga: tá mé anseo chun labhairt leat
result.orig: Tá mé anseo chun labhairt leat
result.html: tá mé anseo chun labhairt leatI am here to talk to you.
result.ponchtml: tá mé anseo ċun laḃairt leatI am here to talk to you.

result.eng: I speak to my friends at midday.
result.ga: labhraím le mo chairde ag meán lae
result.orig: Labhraím le mo chairde ag meán lae
result.html: labhraím le mo chairde ag meán laeI speak to my friends at midday.
result.ponchtml: laḃraím le mo ċairde ag meán laeI speak to my friends at midday.

result.eng: I speak a little French and I am learning Spanish at present.
result.ga: labhraím beagáinín fraincise agus tá mé ag foghlaim spáinnise faoi láthair
result.orig: Labhraím beagáinín Fraincise agus tá mé ag foghlaim Spáinnise faoi láthair
result.html: labhraím beagáinín fraincise agus tá mé ag foghlaim spáinnise faoi láthairI speak a little French and I am learning Spanish at present.
result.ponchtml: laḃraím beagáinín fraincise agus tá mé ag foġlaim spáinnise faoi láṫairI speak a little French and I am learning Spanish at present.

result.eng: Hello. Can I speak with Seán?
result.ga: dia dhuit an féidir liom labhairt le seán
result.orig: Dia dhuit An féidir liom labhairt le Seán
result.html: dia dhuit an féidir liom labhairt le seánHello. Can I speak with Seán?
result.ponchtml: dia ḋuit an féidir liom laḃairt le seánHello. Can I speak with Seán?

result.eng: Could you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.
result.ga: an bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil tá an líne ag briseadh

result.ponchtml: an ḃféadfá laḃairt níos airde le do ṫoil tá an líne ag briseaḋCould you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.

result.eng: I can speak Chinese.
result.ga: is féidir liom sínis a labhairt
result.orig: Is féidir liom Sínis a labhairt
result.html: is féidir liom sínis a labhairtI can speak Chinese.
result.ponchtml: is féidir liom sínis a laḃairtI can speak Chinese.

result.eng: I am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ga: is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.orig: Is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlann
result.html: is bean tí mé agus ní bhíonn mórán seans agam labhairt le daoine eile seachas m'fhear agus mo chlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.
result.ponchtml: is bean tí mé agus ní ḃíonn mórán seans agam laḃairt le daoine eile seaċas m'ḟear agus mo ċlannI am a housewife and I don't have much chance to speak with other people except my husband and my children.

result.eng: Nobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.
result.ga: níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthu
result.orig: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthu
